T5.ShapeLayer

extends: T5.ViewLayer

The ShapeLayer is designed to facilitate the storage and display of multiple geometric shapes. This is particularly useful for displaying GeoJSON data and the like.

Methods

add(poly)

Used to add a T5.Poly to the layer

T5.PolyLayer

deprecated

What already? Yes it really should have been called the T5.ShapeLayer from the start, we will remove the T5.PolyLayer before the 0.9.4 release.
